About Me

This is a little about myself and what I do

I'm a civil engineer by trade and a self-taught web developer
I have extensive knowledge in front-end developments basics: HTML, CSS & Vanilla JS
I am very eager to learn and have the opportunity to contribute to developer/data science projects

Making my way in the front-end development world, one div at a time.

Skills & Knowledge

Front-end Development

Responsive website design.
I have knowledge in HTML, CSS and Vanilla JS

Web Design

Animations and components using CSS Frameworks and JS libraries

Data Analysis

Data extraction and visualisation using Python and its most popular libraries

Languages

I have an advanced understanding of these languages

My Work Process

This is my regular approach to building a new project!

1

Discuss The Project

Review documentation and discuss with clients

2

Get all the info

Define the best methodology to implement.

3

Build

With the latest techonologies, ensuring quality

4

Interact with Clients

Your needs always come first.
